name: CBD Rich Blessing
description: CBD Rich Blessing by Bodhi Seeds is a 2:1 THC/CBD strain steeped in medicinal cannabis genetics. Created by crossing the famous ACDC strain and the father of the Good Medicine Project (Harlequin x Appalachia), this strain is a mixed THC/CBD strain that masterfully balances potency and functionality. CBD Rich Blessing has been known to pop both THC-rich and CBD-dominant phenotypes that emit a pleasant fragrance of woody and floral terpenes. Utilize this strain to improve mood and contend with inflammation.
descriptionPlain: CBD Rich Blessing by Bodhi Seeds is a 2:1 THC/CBD strain steeped in medicinal cannabis genetics. Created by crossing the famous ACDC strain and the father of the Good Medicine Project (Harlequin x Appalachia), this strain is a mixed THC/CBD strain that masterfully balances potency and functionality. CBD Rich Blessing has been known to pop both THC-rich and CBD-dominant phenotypes that emit a pleasant fragrance of woody and floral terpenes. Utilize this strain to improve mood and contend with inflammation.

highlightedReviews.text:
RBL is one of my favorite high-CBD strains. I've tried AC/DC, Cannatonic, Sour Tsunami, Suzy Q, and a few other high-CBD strains, and I love the effects from the RBL. 

By itself, the effects are light, supportive, calming, and focusing. Not a hint of laziness anywhere for me with this strain. My head clears, I'm upbeat and energetic, but relaxed at the same time. The strain I've got has 1% or less THC, and it's barely noticeable at the edges of perception, but it's a nice blend. 

Of my few favorite strains, this is one. It is consistently in my cupboard right next to the other strains I'm careful not to run out of. Highly recommended medical strain, but hard to find. One place in my somewhat small area so far has it, but I'm attempting to find more places or possibly buy a seed/grow a RBL plant this summer.
